subject: Round steering wheel plus QR device.
description_text:
Hello there,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out to inquire about the compatibility of your rounded steering wheel with the Simucube Base. Additionally, I would like to know if the QR quick release system you offer works seamlessly with the Simucube Base as well.

Thank you in advance for your assistance and looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

Nigel Speak

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi nigel speak, The bolt pattern of our quick release is 70mm.Â
